text:
Pretty simple to reproduce:

Use this simple script:
<project name="bug_input" default="proof">
   <target name="proof">
      <input
         message="You won't see this if ant is quiet"
         />
   </target>
</project>
--------

Here is my commandline:

[andre@AUETAL buildtools]$ ant -f bug_input.xml 
Buildfile: bug_input.xml

proof:
    [input] You won't see this if ant is quiet
[andre@AUETAL buildtools]$ ant -q -f bug_input.xml 

>>>>>>>ANT FREEZES HERE UNTIL YOU HIT ENTER<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<

BUILD SUCCESSFUL
Total time: 6 seconds

Take care,

Andre
